subject: Re: Media Release - to post on Investment Trends Website
preview: Hi Sophie, Thanks, much appreciated. You should see the updated invite pop up at any moment. Ah.. apologies, my previous email appears to have been cut off early - I'm just picking up my week after

full_threads.body:
Hi Sophie, 

Thanks, much appreciated. You should see the updated invite pop up at any moment. 

Ah.. apologies, my previous email appears to have been cut off early - I'm just picking up my week after being off sick. 

I'll get a better handle on what you are looking for during our call. That will help put together a proposal which answers the questions around time and budget.

Hi There

Yes of course - sorry I have not come back on other questions I have been working to deadlines this week.

To recap do you need any info from me before the meeting?

Thanks

Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie, 

Do you mind if we push Monday's meeting to either 3 pm or 4 pm? Please let me know your preferred time. 

Thanks and sorry for any inconvenience.

Hi Sophie, 

Great, I saw the booking come through. 

I'd like to learn more about your exact goals to provide an accurate cost.

Perfect all booked in. On the audit how long would you need to complete this?

Just working out if we do it this month based on availability and also approx how long does it take you to load a release?

Be good to know so I can manage our time!

Thanks

Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Sophie, 

There is 1 hour and 45 minutes of support available for June. 

In terms of the audit, let's organise a call to discuss your exact goals so the audit can be structured accordingly. You are welcome to choose your preferred time here: https://calendly.com/chris-paradowski/wolf-iq-introduction30min

I am also keen to get that audit done we discussed. Be great to have a chat about that to and what next steps would be.

Thanks!

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Hi Chris

Can you please confirm how many hours we have outstanding on our monthly retainer? I have a bunch of releases I need posting over the coming days. May get you to focus on this and then I can re engage more strategically from 1 July.

Look forward to hearing from you.

Best

Sophie

Sophie O'Neill

Senior Marketing Manager

P +61 2 8248 8000

Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia

investmenttrends.com

(I work Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday)

Thanks

@manuel can you please create a staging server for Investment Trends? If there is an old one, it is out of date and needs to be updated. Many thanks.

Please let @jaime know once complete.

Hi Sophie, 

Sure thing, please check out: https://www.loom.com/share/ea183c9f822f4bd5b11647bf923ae33d?sid=3bee5915-059d-43e2-9878-d51ba269d030

Any questions from here, please let me know.

Thanks Chris for uploading!

I just jumped in to WordPress and cant find the release post anywhere. It not formatted 100% and I want to tidy it up.

Can you please give me some quick guidance in advance of the tutorial as I really need to get this post out.

I just need to know where to go to find it so I can fix it up.

Thanks again

Sophie

Hi Sophie, 

Do you have more releases to upload? If so, please send them through and we'll do them ASAP.

No worries, I need to get the release up Monday could I possibly get it then!?

Thanks so much and have a great weekend.

Sophie
Chris to record how-to.

Hi Sophie, 

I'm having some technical issues with recording the screen share, sorry! I'll get the how-to over to you early next week if that's ok. 

In the meantime, the media release has been added, you can see it here:
https://investmenttrends.com/2024-super-member-engagement-report
